pages.text: When a bee has generated honeycombs in the $(l:resourcefulbees:apiary/apiary_basics)$(item)Apiary$(), they get put into the $(item)Apiary Storage$().$(br2)The Apiary Storage is also used for the outputs from the Apiary Breeder.$(br2)There are $(or)four upgrades$() available to increase the capacity.
You can connect the storage block to item cables or import busses from other mods for automation purposes.
